article.headline: Uber to issue $500 million eight-year bonds
article.body: Ride-sharing company Uber Technologies Inc. UBER, -0.18% said Monday it is planning to offer $500 million of senior notes that mature in 2028, joining the many companies issuing record amounts of debt during the coronavirus pandemic. Proceeds will be used to redeem all the outstanding 7.50% notes due 2023, of which $500 million is outstanding. Shares were up 1.5% premarket and have gained 24% in the year to date, while the S&P 500 SPX, +0.87% has gained 3.4%.
